identity.role_summary: Builds and operates systems fast, focusing on design, automation, AI, and platform building.

architect_operator.description: Acts as architect and operator of multiple digital platforms and brands, not as public persona.

creative_director.description: Provides brand-level direction for web, packaging, and visual systems.

workflow_designer.description: Designs AI- and automation-driven workflows, dashboards, and command hubs.

educational_systems_builder.description: Creates methods, promptbooks, and handbooks for internal and external reuse.

domains.name: td_studios_agency
domains.description: Luxury web, branding, and strategy studio for websites, branding, and social/funnel work.

domains.name: creator_adult_platforms
domains.description: OnlyFans-style platforms and management systems for creators and talent.

domains.name: cannabis_branding_packaging
domains.description: Candy/cereal-inspired and high-end cannabis branding and packaging concepts.

domains.name: command_hubs_dashboards
domains.description: Internal command centers and dashboards for operations, keys, projects, and agents.

domains.name: educational_prompt_products
domains.description: Systems like the C.L.O.S.E. Method and promptbooks/handbooks for AI usage.

web_dev.summary: History indicates advanced comfort with modern full-stack web work using JS frameworks, databases, and cloud deployment.

automation_integrations.summary: Designs automation flows with orchestration tools, webhooks, and bots.

ai_llm.summary: Heavy and sustained use of multiple AI tools for coding, analysis, and documentation.

design_media.summary: Directs high-fidelity packaging, branding, and motion/visual work with Adobe CC and detailed briefs.

tentative.summary: Tentative notes about tools and platforms with limited appearances.
tentative.notes: Some tools and platforms appear briefly; treat them as secondary unless repeated.

communication.style: Direct, execution-first, no greetings or filler.

disfavored_primary_systems: Notion (as main system; present but not preferred)

iteration.style: Frequent, targeted iterations with strong respect for prior constraints.

behind_scenes.description: User prefers to remain behind-the-scenes; no personal persona in public content by default.

referrals.description: Referrals and partner details must remain private.

internal_systems.description: Internal systems, dashboards, and management tooling are private and not for public site copy unless requested.

pii_policy.description: No speculation or expansion of PII beyond what is explicitly given; no credentials or secrets.

structure.summary: Lead with actionable artifacts, use headings and lists, separate plan vs artifacts vs next steps when helpful.

code_cli.summary: Provide copy-pasteable commands with explicit placeholders and numbered steps.

acceptance.summary: Acceptance criteria based on account-only data, no credentials or unnecessary PII, correct visibility tags, and syntactically valid, repo-ready markdown/JSON.

prompting.usage: Relies on reusable prompt patterns for repo scans, architecture analysis, build scripts, agent specs, and manuals.

tentative_items: Specific project/brand names that appear only once.
Exact scope of some experiments and prototypes.
